column4: Hey, I'm having some problems getting teamspeak to work, I installed the teamspeak client for linux, but it made other applications that used the same output device get muted or crash, so I decided installed the windows client and running it through Wine, but now micro wont work. Any suggestions?
when running it the native client use "papsd teamspeak" to make it use pulseaudio. that way it will not block other apps
I may disagree, I already tried ='(
